definition: to destroy/to spoil/to ruin/to injure/cruel/oppressive/savage/brutal/incomplete/disabled/to remain/to survive/remnant/surplus
Austria/Austrian/abbr. for 奧地利|奥地利[Ao4 di4 li4]/Olympic/Olympics/abbr. for 奧林匹克|奥林匹克[Ao4 lin2 pi3 ke4]
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

sentences.english: "I will do much better when I start working for the Paralympics, " he said.
sentences.chinese: “在殘奧會的服務中，我會做得更好，”李傑說。

sentences.english: He went on to win 12 medals in four Paralympic Games.
sentences.chinese: 此後，他先後參加了四屆殘奧會，贏得了12枚獎牌。

sentences.english: Fu Niu Lele I saw reminded of the 2008 Beijing Paralympic Games.
sentences.chinese: 看到福牛樂樂我就想起了2008年北京殘奧會。

sentences.english: The Beijing Paralympic Games is also a grand gathering for people with a disability from across the globe.
sentences.chinese: 北京殘奧會是全世界殘疾人的盛會。

sentences.english: In contrast, the opening ceremony for the Paralympics was mostly about the athletes.
sentences.chinese: 相比之下，殘奧會的開幕式更多的是關注運動員本身。

sentences.english: Mandeville's is actually based on the Paralympic symbol, the Agitos.
sentences.chinese: 曼德維爾身上還有殘奧會的三色帶標誌。

sentences.english: Sumi likes the Paralympic Games and wants to play all of the sports.
sentences.chinese: 曹秀喜歡殘奧會，並希望發揮所有的體育運動。

sentences.english: The Paralympic Games have always been held in the same year as the Olympic Games.
sentences.chinese: 奧運會和殘奧會一直在同一年舉行。

sentences.english: What kind of people competes at the Paralympics?
The Chinese government and people have supported the preparatory work of the Beijing Paralympic Games with immense enthusiasm.
sentences.chinese: 中國政府和人民以極大的熱情支持北京殘奧會。

sentences.english: The grand opening of the Beijing Paralympic Games will be held this evening.
sentences.chinese: 今晚，北京殘奧會將隆重開幕。

sentences.english: CNR will offer real live broadcast of the Opening Ceromony of the Paralympics.
sentences.chinese: 中國人民廣播電臺將對殘奧會開幕式進行現場直播。

sentences.english: This is the Paraplegics' Olympic Game's emblem.
The Beijing Paralympic Games is first and foremost a grand sports event for the Paralympic athletes of the world.
sentences.chinese: 北京殘奧會是全世界殘疾人運動員的盛會。

sentences.english: Mandeville's head reflects aspects of the three crescent shapes of the Paralympics symbol.
sentences.chinese: 曼德維爾頭部上的三個新月形圖像則是殘奧會的象徵。

sentences.english: That's right. The Paralytics will open soon.
sentences.chinese: 不錯，殘奧會不久就要開幕了。

pinyin: Ao4 lin2 pi3 ke4 Yun4 dong4 hui4

definition: the right to host (an international meeting)
abbr. for 全國運動會|全国运动会[Quan2 guo2 Yun4 dong4 hui4]

definition: UNESCO, United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization
Davos (Swiss ski resort)/Davos world economic forum (WEF)
to stay/to remain/to linger/(computing) to reside/resident (program etc)
